name: Adi Sarid
tagline: A PhD student at Tel-Aviv University and partner at Sarid Research Institute LTD.

Research interests include:
* Power grids: generation and transmission expansion planning
* Designing for robustness and resilience of grids
* Practical operations research (implementing OR projects in the industry)
